name: isp-management-system
description: ISP Installation, Repair & Warehouse Management System with WhatsApp Integration

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run db:sync && cd .. && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.deploy: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001/api} SERVER_PORT=${SERVER_PORT:-3001} CLIENT_PORT=${CLIENT_PORT:-3000} sh -c 'cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run db:sync && cd .. && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"'
scripts.start:server: cross-env PORT=${SERVER_PORT:-3001} cd server && npm start
scripts.start:client: cd client && cross-env PORT=${CLIENT_PORT:-3000} NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL:-http://localhost:3001/api} npm run start
